content: Wow making mutilated horses for your minis
games alright now we're going to use these tube horses and these are great
for your RPG games they're really close to the 28 millimeter size and I've
gotten one out of the tube set and I'm going to use this wire cutter and start
gashing into the kind of rubbery plastic that these things are made out of and
just start cashing it up and trying to make it look like wounds this thing's
been slashed or gashed and kind of rip into it and there we go now to paint
those wounds up I'm going to use those cherry red and let's paint right into
the wound the deep recess of the wound there and get a nice effect I really
like to use this kind of 2/10 two-toned Gore here it really adds to it and I'll
kind of add some lighter red on the top this is a brighter red kind of add this
on the top and then maybe some blood trails coming down that kind of thing
there we go nice and gory all right cool now to gloss the wounds up I'm gonna use
this water-based poly acrylic and this will last you forever and you can use
this on a lot of projects so here we have a set up here as a road going
through the country and we have our adventures and they're gonna come down
the road so I have them walk down the road and then you could've filled this
wagon that's turned over and that's kind of good way to do it when you're doing
your game so just throw everything on the table as the as the adventures kind
of discover it you can start revealing stuff in layers so that way it's not
like oh here is everything you have a godlike view of everything right so as
the players come around that rock they could see the dead horse laying here and
you can show them the horse and they can examine it and maybe it's been cut up by
swords or you know whatever whatever evil befell the horse and maybe they're
looking for the guy that's driving the cart and he's not there so they better
go find him there you go I'm mutilated horse Minnie hey I hope you find these
tips helpful if you did give your old DM Scottie a
thumbs up and that be alike also check out my forum and Facebook group a bunch
of wonderful people on there and if you do like these vids consider tipping
their is a little tip thing on the video you can click on that and tip directly
to your DM Scottie and if you want to go take it further than that you can go to
patreon and become a supporter and a member of the family I have a monthly
magazine called the crafters lair which I'll have instant access to when you
become a supporter take care have fun gaming
crafts are you reading my telepathy I just want to say why beat a dead horse
when you can craft it
